text: Motion
Motion
Motion

Hmm~ ...For Kiriko, maybe a bookmark with
pressed flowers would be nice...

For Sakuya...
how about a set of postcards with ocean scenes...

For Mamimi, since she had something she
wanted before leaving, should I get that...?

And for Yuika... Producer,
what about a camera strap or something like that...?

...Oh,
that sounds good, doesn't it?
...Producer?

Well, I was just thinking that you really pay attention
to and care about the members, Kogane.
I was a bit impressed.

Ahaha, that's right, that's right~
After all, I'm L'Antica's leader!
Haha, you're reliable.

Hehe,
well then, I'll go pay the bill~!
Ah, Kogane.
Do you need to buy souvenirs for yourself?

Oh, right!
I totally forgot about that!

Hmm...
what should I get...

Keychains or snow globes could make
good souvenirs...

Snacks or pickles, and maybe some broth
or soy sauce could be nice too...

Hahaha... yeah, that's right,
it's okay to spend another 10 minutes deciding.

10 minutes~!
Got it~!

Mmm...
They're all so nice, it's hard to decide~!

Ah...!
Producer!
What's wrong?

If it's alright, could you choose for me?
My souvenir...

I don't mind, but... Isn't choosing something
like this supposed to be enjoyable for you?

That might be true, 
but... I want Producer to choose for me~!
...Understood.

I don't know if I'll be able to choose as well as Kiriko does...
But I'll try to pick something that suits you.

Hehe...
thank you, Producer!
...How about this one?

A snow globe!
It's really pretty~!
Do you think it suits me?

During the recording, there was a question about
playing in the snow with the other members, right?

You seemed really excited about playing in the snow with
everyone... and you handled the slightly mean questions so well.

Hehe... it was like talking about playing in the snow with
everyone! I thought it would be so much fun with everyone!

I thought you became a good idol,
a reliable leader...

I also wanted to see everyone playing in the snow,
so I thought this souvenir would be nice.
That's what I thought...

Thank you, Producer.
I'll treasure it...
